quote_first: Virtual curtains mirrored her movement, sliding across the screen and dimming the room lighting. The red numbers
quote_last: faded but showed in the top right hand corner.
quote_raw: Virtual curtains mirrored her movement, sliding across the screen and dimming the room lighting. The red numbers 06:14 faded but showed in the top right hand corner.
title: Mother Moon
author: Bob Goddard
